name: Gravity Haus Truckee-Tahoe
description: Formerly the Cedar House Sport Hotel, Gravity Haus Truckee-Tahoe is a boutique mountain lodge just a mile from downtown Truckee and minutes from Palisades Tahoe, Northstar, and Lake Tahoe. The 42-room property blends mountain-modern design with an active lifestyle ethos — featuring the onsite restaurant Stella, Dryland Fitness center, co-working spaces, a sauna, hot tub, and outdoor firepit. Eco-conscious travelers love the LEED-certified design with reclaimed wood, radiant heat flooring, and organic bedding.
shortDescription: Boutique mountain lodge in Truckee with Stella restaurant, fitness center, sauna, and hot tub — minutes from Palisades Tahoe and Northstar.

roomTypes.name: King Room
roomTypes.description: Mountain-modern king room with organic bedding, private bathroom, balcony, air conditioning, and free WiFi. Reclaimed wood accents and radiant heat flooring.

roomTypes.name: Double Queen Room
roomTypes.description: Spacious room with two queen beds, perfect for families or friends. Same mountain-modern finishes with balcony and all standard amenities.

roomTypes.name: Family Suite
roomTypes.description: Larger suite accommodating families with separate living area, private bathroom, and balcony overlooking the pine forest.

dining.name: Stella
dining.description: Seasonally inspired Mediterranean cuisine sourced from central California. Breakfast daily, dinner Thursday through Sunday with full table service and curated wine menu.

dining.name: Callahan's Lobby Bar
dining.description: Cozy lobby bar serving espresso, craft cocktails, California wines, and local beer. Perfect for après-ski or evening relaxation by the fireplace.

faqs.question: Is Gravity Haus the same as Cedar House Sport Hotel?
faqs.answer: Yes — Gravity Haus purchased the Cedar House Sport Hotel in late 2021. The property retains the same mountain-modern charm with added amenities including fitness, co-working, and an enhanced dining program.

faqs.question: Do I need a membership to stay at Gravity Haus?
faqs.answer: No — membership is not required to book lodging. All hotel guests have access to the fitness center, hot tub, sauna, and restaurant. Membership provides additional perks and discounts.

faqs.question: How far is Gravity Haus from the ski resorts?
faqs.answer: Palisades Tahoe (formerly Squaw Valley) and Northstar California are both a short drive away. Downtown Truckee is just 1 mile. Reno-Tahoe International Airport is about 35 minutes.

faqs.question: Does Gravity Haus offer golf packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra creates custom stay-and-play packages with Gravity Haus lodging and tee times at 20+ Reno-Tahoe courses. Call 888-584-8232 for a free quote.
